name: Cat Fight (Mellow Minds)
description:
From the Creators of Cat Fight, join Egg MacMuffin on her journey to obtain the Women's International Boxing Minor League title belt

Created for the 1st Annual 3 Star Game Jam hosted by ninjamuffin99

HOW TO PLAY

Left Mouse Button: Select

W: Block

A: Dodge Left

S: Duck

D: Dodge Right

Left Arrow: Punch Left

Right Arrow: Punch Right

Mellow Minds is:

Fish125: Egg Designer, Backgrounds, Additional Programming, Hamster Microwaver

Ape Jones: Betty Designer, Mandy Designer, Punch-Out Consultant

The Red Weirdo: Celine Designer, Additional Art, Woman Enthusiast

Octopus: Programming, Sexy DVD Enjoyer, Woman Puncher

Mighty Oreo: Poopnose, Professional Cadaver, Resting in Peace XD
